{"step_by_step_thinking": "A gypsum-bonded investment is a material used in dentistry for the casting of prosthetics. The consistency of the mix can affect the properties of the final product. A thinner mix means that there is more water in the mixture. This would increase the setting expansion because the water would evaporate during the setting process, leaving more space for the material to expand.", "answer_choice": "C. Increase setting expansion"}
